headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
There are myriad sales on offer across Los Santos, including the Master Penthouse Suite atop The Diamond, as well as all MC Clubhouses and more.

If youâ€™re looking to deck a vehicle out in sponsors and face off against physics, all Open Wheel Racecars are 40% off, not to mention discounts on vehicles of all shapes and sizes.

- Master Penthouse Suite - 50% Off
- MC Clubhouses - 50% Off
- Progen PR4 - 40% Off
- RC Bandito - 50% Off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
